summary: Basically gives a new 1 click version of the vanillal firebolt spell check it out :D
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a new spell tome located in the Arch-Mages Quarters
It gives a very fast but weaker 1 click version of the vanilla Firebolt spell
It basically makes you look like a badass hurling firebolts at enemies every click of the mouse(or gamepad, but who uses a gamepad with modded skyrim :P)
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qRzKhfYq_30
author: zanger1234
